thoughts.title: First Thought
thoughts.body: This tutorial has done in 4 hours what I felt lost on for two weeks.  Pluralsight is trash!
thoughts.author: Tim

thoughts.title: I second this
thoughts.body: Tien popped in with an alleyoup(sp) with a codeAcademy link to help with my special learning style that seems to match his.  Mad respect!
thoughts.author: Tehm

thoughts.title: 3 Days Later
thoughts.body: I am on chapter 28 of the net ninja video tutorial.  Yes I am slow but steady she goes while I absorb new knowledge and apply it in a way I understand it!
thoughts.author: tim

thoughts.title: Button
thoughts.body: This is a test of the button state change.
thoughts.author: tim

thoughts.title: History Hook
thoughts.body: Let's see if this reroutes us to where we direct the history push tells us to go.
thoughts.author: tim
